my ip for the server is runeMU.no-ip.info[br][size=1]Posted at: November 13, 2006, 09:39:23 PM[/size][hr]im trying to stay away form teh whole HAM stuff…and i have all my stuff running but when i try to connect it keeps saying server offline…i tryied to portfoward it but wht do i haft to do…i hd to portfoward my torrent client so i do know how to do it…but i dont know what to do when it comes to this runescape stuff[br][size=1]Posted at: November 13, 2006, 09:42:02 PM[/size][hr]no one can help me[br][size=1]Posted at: November 13, 2006, 09:59:23 PM[/size][hr]ok no one can help me wow

item.title: [help]can i run my own server on a wireless internet?(will give 2++rep)
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

NOPE!!!
First: We dont talk rep on forums.
Second: Yes you can, you can use no-ip.com but you will need to port foward. Or you can use hamachi which I use on my laptop. I find it lags less… its better because you can talk to the people without even being on the server.

Plus you need to either keep your compiler.bat open or runserver.bat
NOTE: You can only have one open at a time. When you try to login use 0.0.0.0 Depeding on which your useing (hamachi or no-ip) you need to give them the ip.
Hamachi: The ip (#.#.#.#) At the top of the hamachi
No-ip: Tell them the ip that you registers on the site.

Read full topic

they join that than type in your ip and theyre in[br][size=1]Posted at: November 13, 2006, 06:34:45 PM[/size][hr]wait nvmd
make sure you have runserver going the whole time
